title: Debug text displayed instead of ward skin name
body:
Debug text displayed instead of ward skin name for a specific ward skin, please see the screenshots for more information. Please note that the skin was received from a Hextech Chest and I cannot reproduce the issue. The skin is not available in the Shop.

http://prnt.sc/cs3wx9

replies.body: Thanks for the report! :) We'll take a look into this and see why the proper name isn't showing.
